name: Sugar Fruit Match
description: Sugar Fruit Match is a new game by Pixberry Studios. Experience the fruity sugar rush like never before. Beat the levels and collect all the sugar in this magic land of fruit. Many different game modes for you to enjoy and spend your time with. From the friendly fruit collecting to the unforgettable AI battles that will test your skill. Be the hero that will bring peace to this land once and for all. 50 levels are waiting for you!
